Miriam Suzanne » Colors

$brand-colors (Map)

scss 
$brand-colors: (
  '_brand-main': hsl(195, 52%, 31%),
  '_brand-accent': hsl(330, 100%, 45%)
    (
      'shade': 25% #000,
    ),
  '_brand-gray': '#_brand-main'
    (
      'desaturate': 30%,
    ),
);

The brand is defined by our primary brand blue, along with secondary pink and orange base colors.

Color Previews

_brand-main #266478 rgb(38, 100, 120) hsl(195, 52%, 31%)
_brand-accent #ad0056 rgb(173, 0, 86) hsl(330, 100%, 34%)
_brand-gray #3e5860 rgb(62, 88, 96) hsl(194, 22%, 31%)

$shade-colors (Map)

scss 
$shade-colors: shades-of($brand-colors, 5);

Tints and shades of the brand colors.

$contrast-colors (Map)

scss 
$contrast-colors: (
  '_contrast-light': color('#_brand-gray-light-5'),
  '_contrast-dark': color('#_brand-main-dark-5'),
);

The light and dark contrast colors act as the high and low range of our palette. These colors should not be dynamic.

Color Previews

_contrast-light #edf0f1 rgb(237, 240, 241) hsl(195, 12%, 94%)
_contrast-dark #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%)

$theme-colors (Map)

scss 
$theme-colors: (
  'background': '#_contrast-light',
  'text': '#_brand-main-dark-4',
  'text-light': '#_brand-main-dark-2',
  'border': '#_brand-gray-0',
  'border-light': '#_brand-gray-light-1',
  'action': '#_brand-accent-dark-2',
  'action-underline': '#_brand-accent-light-2',
  'action-hover': '#_brand-accent-dark-4',
);

Main theme colors will be set as relative CSS variables – applying the above colors to more specific use-cases. This map should not include any color-adjustments.

Color Previews

background #edf0f1 rgb(237, 240, 241) hsl(195, 12%, 94%)
text #205566 rgb(32, 85, 102) hsl(195, 52%, 26%)
text-light #326c7f rgb(50, 108, 127) hsl(195, 44%, 35%)
border #73868c rgb(115, 134, 140) hsl(194, 10%, 50%)
border-light #88989e rgb(136, 152, 158) hsl(196, 10%, 58%)
action #b10f5f rgb(177, 15, 95) hsl(330, 84%, 38%)
action-underline #d083ab rgb(208, 131, 171) hsl(329, 45%, 66%)
action-hover #89074c rgb(137, 7, 76) hsl(328, 90%, 28%)

$invert-colors (Map)

scss 
$invert-colors: (
  'background': '#_contrast-dark',
  'text': '#_brand-main-light-4',
  'text-light': '#_brand-main-light-2',
  'border': '#_brand-gray-0',
  'border-light': '#_brand-gray-dark-1',
  'action': '#_brand-accent-light-3',
  'action-underline': '#_brand-accent-dark-2',
  'action-hover': '#_brand-accent-light-4',
);

Inverted theme colors for light-on-dark mode. This map should not include any color-adjustments.

Color Previews

background #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%)
text #c3d2d7 rgb(195, 210, 215) hsl(195, 20%, 80%)

action #d8a0bd rgb(216, 160, 189) hsl(329, 42%, 74%)
action-underline #b10f5f rgb(177, 15, 95) hsl(330, 84%, 38%)
action-hover #dfbdd0 rgb(223, 189, 208) hsl(326, 35%, 81%)
